div.p: Game Objects (Display Objects/Entities) are classed as either global or local objects. Global objects are always active, while local object are only active then their map is active.
div.pre: - Game World | |-- Global Entities | |-- Map | |-- Map Entities - Update Display
- Check if View has Moved off Map |- If Map is part of Section? | |- Switch to neighbouring map |- Else | |- Stay on map
